ygData.subject: RE: Surfing gone
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ooooh. ;-)  I didn t get the evensong yet, I was being hypothetical in discussing the mace look.  I missed it again.  heh.  Ahh well, the people who broke
ygData.messageBody:
> cool you got your evensong, grats. by the way i saw many items for bards in
> PoS, through quests. probably won't get any too soon at level 50 tho, but
> the one that caught my eye was "harmonic spear." no joke. now i KNOW you
> can't wait to wield that baby.

Ooooh. ;-) I didn't get the evensong yet, I was being hypothetical
in discussing the mace look. I missed it again. heh. Ahh well,
the people who broke hate this time died like 6-8 times, since the
1) change to the plane, and 2) change to the L50 cap. Lots of people
lost levels while I was happily twinking my druid.

Harmonic Distortion, 50th unchained melody.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
Innoruuk <The Unbidden>

Dagato Catnip, 20th 'holy sh*t I can do 94 dmg now' druid.
Treehugger of Tunare's Twinks.
Innoruuk
